about.name: Oksana Korobanova
about.description1: I work for more than 5 years in the IT industry as a Front End Developer (React: 1+ year of commercial experience). The most recent work is a cloud-based(AWS) SaaS business process management platform built from scratch.
about.description2: I have a Master Degree in System Software.
about.description3: I have also full-stack developer experience with open source CMS (WordPress, Joomla).
